long_description: Designed specifically for outdoor enthusiasts, the waterproof Yurbuds Venture Pro Earphones deliver three-button music/call control and a secure in-ear design that keeps them in place on the go. Three-button microphone system seamlessly controls music tracks and voice calls on most Apple devices. Patented twist lock technology locks Yurbuds securely into your ears and keeps them there through all kinds of intense physical movement. Ergonomic design employs medical-grade silicone to offer a soft, comfortable and personalized fit that avoids pressing on sensitive pain points. Clinically proven acoustics deliver deep, rich sound with all types of music, yet they allow sufficient ambient noise to keep you aware of your surroundings. The Yurbuds Venture Pro Earphones feature IPX5 waterproofness and flat Kevlar cords with a protective coating for water- and tangle-resistant durability.
short_description: Designed specifically for outdoor enthusiasts, the waterproof Yurbuds Venture Pro Earphones deliver three-button music/call control and a secure in-ear design that keeps them in place on the go.
